languages.text: "Оглянись, мон-кай. Вы захватили этот мир, что не принадлежит вам. Вскрыли его чрево, подчинили его волю, изуродовали лик, пытаясь выжать Лилэтан, словно спелый плод. Я видел лежащие перед нами пути — на каждом из них присутствие мон-кай знаменует гибель Мирового духа. Я не допущу этого".

traits.locale_text: "Оглянись, мон-кай. Вы захватили этот мир, что не принадлежит вам. Вскрыли его чрево, подчинили его волю, изуродовали лик, пытаясь выжать Лилэтан, словно спелый плод. Я видел лежащие перед нами пути — на каждом из них присутствие мон-кай знаменует гибель Мирового духа. Я не допущу этого".

languages.text: "Look around you, mon-keigh. Your kind captured a world that did not belong to you. You broke open her heart, crushed her will, disfigured her face, trying to squeeze every drop of life out of the Lilaethan like a ripe fruit. I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the World Spirit. I will not allow it."
languages.original_text: "Оглянись, мон-кай. Вы захватили этот мир, что не принадлежит вам. Вскрыли его чрево, подчинили его волю, изуродовали лик, пытаясь выжать Лилэтан, словно спелый плод. Я видел лежащие перед нами пути — на каждом из них присутствие мон-кай знаменует гибель Мирового духа. Я не допущу этого".

You broke open its heart, crushed its will, disfigured its face, trying to squeeze every drop of life out of the Lilaethan like a ripe fruit. I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the world spirit. I will not allow it."

I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the world spirit. I will not allow it."

languages.text: “看看你的周围吧，猴子。你的同族占领了不属于你们的世界。你粉碎了她的心，瓦解了她的意志，玷污了她的容貌。你们打算像榨取成熟的果实一样，榨取莉莱赞的每一滴生命。我已经看到了摆在我们面前的道路。而在每一条道路上，猴子的存在都预示着世界之魂的消亡。我不能允许这种事情发生。”
languages.original_text: "Look around you, mon-keigh. Your kind captured a world that did not belong to you. You broke open her heart, crushed her will, disfigured her face, trying to squeeze every drop of life out of the Lilaethan like a ripe fruit. I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the World Spirit. I will not allow it."

traits.locale_text: “看看你的周围吧，猴子。你的同族占领了不属于你们的世界。你粉碎了她的心，瓦解了她的意志，玷污了她的容貌。你们打算像榨取成熟的果实一样，榨取莉莱赞的每一滴生命。我已经看到了摆在我们面前的道路。而在每一条道路上，猴子的存在都预示着世界之魂的消亡。我不能允许这种事情发生。”

languages.text: 「周りを見よ、モン＝ケイ。己のものですらなかった星を、人間は支配した。星の心をこじ開け、意思をくじき、大地を傷つけ、熟した果実のようにリラエタンの命を最後の一滴まで搾り取ろうとしている。私は我らの前にある道を見ているが、どの道においても、モン＝ケイが存在することは世界の魂の消滅の前触れとなる。それを許すわけにはいかぬ」
languages.original_text: "Look around you, mon-keigh. Your kind captured a world that did not belong to you. You broke open her heart, crushed her will, disfigured her face, trying to squeeze every drop of life out of the Lilaethan like a ripe fruit. I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the World Spirit. I will not allow it."

traits.locale_text: 「周りを見よ、モン＝ケイ。己のものですらなかった星を、人間は支配した。星の心をこじ開け、意思をくじき、大地を傷つけ、熟した果実のようにリラエタンの命を最後の一滴まで搾り取ろうとしている。私は我らの前にある道を見ているが、どの道においても、モン＝ケイが存在することは世界の魂の消滅の前触れとなる。それを許すわけにはいかぬ」

languages.text: "Seht Euch um, Chem-Pan-Sey. Die Euren haben eine Welt erobert, die Euch nicht gehörte. Ihr habt ihr Herz aufgerissen, ihren Willen zerstört, ihr Gesicht entstellt und versucht, jeden Tropfen Leben aus Lileath herauszupressen wie aus einer reifen Frucht. Ich habe die Pfade gesehen, die vor uns liegen – auf jedem von ihnen kündet die Anwesenheit von Chem-Pan-Sey vom Untergang des Weltenbewusstseins. Das werde ich nicht zulassen."
languages.original_text: "Look around you, mon-keigh. Your kind captured a world that did not belong to you. You broke open her heart, crushed her will, disfigured her face, trying to squeeze every drop of life out of the Lilaethan like a ripe fruit. I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the World Spirit. I will not allow it."

traits.locale_text: "Seht Euch um, Chem-Pan-Sey. Die Euren haben eine Welt erobert, die Euch nicht gehörte. Ihr habt ihr Herz aufgerissen, ihren Willen zerstört, ihr Gesicht entstellt und versucht, jeden Tropfen Leben aus Lileath herauszupressen wie aus einer reifen Frucht. Ich habe die Pfade gesehen, die vor uns liegen – auf jedem von ihnen kündet die Anwesenheit von Chem-Pan-Sey vom Untergang des Weltenbewusstseins. Das werde ich nicht zulassen."

languages.text: « Regardez autour de vous, mon-keigh. Vos semblables se sont emparés d'un monde qui ne leur appartenait pas. Vous avez mis son cœur à nu, piétiné sa volonté et défiguré son visage en essayant d'extraire jusqu'à la dernière goutte de vie de la lilaethan comme s'il s'agissait d'un fruit mûr. J'ai vu les voies qui s'étendent devant nous : sur chacune, la présence des mon-keigh annonce la mort de l'esprit-monde. Je ne le permettrai pas. »
languages.original_text: "Look around you, mon-keigh. Your kind captured a world that did not belong to you. You broke open her heart, crushed her will, disfigured her face, trying to squeeze every drop of life out of the Lilaethan like a ripe fruit. I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the World Spirit. I will not allow it."

traits.locale_text: « Regardez autour de vous, mon-keigh. Vos semblables se sont emparés d'un monde qui ne leur appartenait pas. Vous avez mis son cœur à nu, piétiné sa volonté et défiguré son visage en essayant d'extraire jusqu'à la dernière goutte de vie de la lilaethan comme s'il s'agissait d'un fruit mûr. J'ai vu les voies qui s'étendent devant nous : sur chacune, la présence des mon-keigh annonce la mort de l'esprit-monde. Je ne le permettrai pas. »

languages.text: «Mira a tu alrededor, mon-keigh. Tu especie capturó un mundo que no le pertenecía. Hendisteis su corazón, doblegasteis su voluntad y desfigurasteis su rostro en vuestros esfuerzos por exprimir hasta la última gota de vida del Lilaethan como si de una fruta madura se tratase. He visto lo que yace ante nosotros, y en todas las sendas posibles, la presencia de los mon-keigh precede a la muerte del espíritu del mundo. No lo permitiré».
languages.original_text: "Look around you, mon-keigh. Your kind captured a world that did not belong to you. You broke open her heart, crushed her will, disfigured her face, trying to squeeze every drop of life out of the Lilaethan like a ripe fruit. I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the World Spirit. I will not allow it."

traits.locale_text: «Mira a tu alrededor, mon-keigh. Tu especie capturó un mundo que no le pertenecía. Hendisteis su corazón, doblegasteis su voluntad y desfigurasteis su rostro en vuestros esfuerzos por exprimir hasta la última gota de vida del Lilaethan como si de una fruta madura se tratase. He visto lo que yace ante nosotros, y en todas las sendas posibles, la presencia de los mon-keigh precede a la muerte del espíritu del mundo. No lo permitiré».

languages.text: "Etrafına bak da gör mon-keigh. Türün, size ait olmayan bir dünyaya el koydu. Bu dünyanın kalbini zorla açtınız, iradesini ezdiniz, çehresinin güzelliğini bozdunuz ve sanki olgun bir meyveymiş gibi Lilaethan'ı son damlasına dek sıkmaya çalışıyorsunuz. Önümüzdeki yolları gördüm. Hepsinde de mon-keighlerin varlığı, Dünya Ruhu'nun ölümüne dalalet ediyor. Buna izin vermem."
languages.original_text: "Look around you, mon-keigh. Your kind captured a world that did not belong to you. You broke open her heart, crushed her will, disfigured her face, trying to squeeze every drop of life out of the Lilaethan like a ripe fruit. I have seen the paths that lie before us — on each of them, the presence of the mon-keigh heralds the demise of the World Spirit. I will not allow it."

traits.locale_text: "Etrafına bak da gör mon-keigh. Türün, size ait olmayan bir dünyaya el koydu. Bu dünyanın kalbini zorla açtınız, iradesini ezdiniz, çehresinin güzelliğini bozdunuz ve sanki olgun bir meyveymiş gibi Lilaethan'ı son damlasına dek sıkmaya çalışıyorsunuz. Önümüzdeki yolları gördüm. Hepsinde de mon-keighlerin varlığı, Dünya Ruhu'nun ölümüne dalalet ediyor. Buna izin vermem."
